itemDescription: Church of Scotland minister and author

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Ranken (1755–1827) was an 18th/19th century Church of Scotland minister and historian, who served as Moderator of the General Assembly in 1811.

link_mentions.page: List of Moderators of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland

response: * Rev Alexander Ranken born and raised in Currie
*Rev Alexander Ranken minister of the adjacent church 1785 to 1827, Moderator in 1811

In 1811 Edinburgh University awarded him an honorary Doctor of Divinity. In 1812 he succeeded Alexander Ranken as Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland the highest position in the Scottish church.
